verbose_text: There are three main findings according to our data as following : firstly, MYPT1 inhibited capillary tube formation of endothelial cells in vitro and tumor angiogenesis in vivo with the downregulation of VEGF and CD31 expression; secondly, MYPT1 expression was markedly decreased in clinical PCa tissues with a negative correlation of CD31 expression; thirdly, the combined expression of MYPT1-downregulation / CD31-upregulation was significantly associated with advanced progression and poor prognosis in patients with PCa.
